| HistoryText             = A secret organization that studied a serum that produced spontaneous combustion on the one in which it was injected and tested it on runaway boys including [[Rebecca Barnes (Heroes Reborn) (Earth-616)|Rikki Barnes]]. The organization was opposed by the [[Natalia Romanova (Earth-616)|Black Widow]] who captured and defeated their principal scientist, [[Character Index/H#Hunt|Dr. Hunt]] by saving Rikki but was unable to subtract the tested serum samples from the organization.
